form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Abandonment by Alien of Status as Lawful Permanent Resident

full_text: UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE To DET. ABANDONMENT BY ALIEN OF STATUS AS LAWFUL PERMANENT RESIDENT 1. MY DEPARTURE OR PRESENCE OUTSIDE THE U.S. IS IS NOT FOR THE PURPOSE OF AVOIDING OR EVADING SERVICE IN THE ARMED FORCES OF THE UNITED STATES. 10. DOCUMENTS SURRENDERED. (Describe) Reenter Permit 11. SIGNATURE OF ALIEN DATE PLACE see below FOR GOVERNMENT USE ONLY REMARKS OF IMMIGRATION OR COUNSULAR OFFICER: re-entry permit of Wladslawa Motacka was sent to this office by mail with the attached statement from the City of Essen, Germany and declaration of the subject. Subject did not appear to complete I-407 and the form is being used to transmit the re-entry permit to INS/Frankfurt for further disposition.
